transArray.content: The hotel lobby is clean and bright, the front desk is skilled and the service is very warm. The room was clean and smell-free, and hot water in the shower was supplied quickly. The sheets and quilts are very clean, and there are light switches for the whole house at the bedside, which is very convenient, and the air conditioner heats and cools very quickly. The room is well soundproofed and very peacefulðŸ’•
Dear guest, thank you for taking time out of your busy schedule to share your stay experience. You are a little man with a gentleness that is concealed by your publicity. I love you.
